attributes.action: Say Get Out Of My Pub on their doorstep at 8 00pm
attributes.additional_details: Remember when Barbara Windsor was in Eastenders and a catch phrase Get out of my pub. We can all remember what a wonderful human being she was and have a memory about her.
attributes.background: Get the Nation on their doorstep at 8 00pm and say Get Out of My Pub

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
